sentences.en: Chueh - hui was setting off a " Miraculous Book and Arrows " for the boys.
sentences.cn: 他正看见 觉慧 在天井里替弟弟们燃放 “ 神书带箭 ”.

sentences.en: Hearing is only part of the story of my miraculous inner ear.
sentences.cn: 听觉只是我的神秘内耳的故事的一部分.

sentences.en: I finally blurted out my most miraculous guess of the war.
sentences.cn: 此为我在战争中最奇异的预言.

sentences.en: If so, it possessed muscles of a quite miraculous quality.
sentences.cn: 果真如此的话, 它所长的肌肉当具有不可思议的素质.

sentences.en: In much of his verse the miraculous combination collapsed.
sentences.cn: 在他许多首诗里,那种奇妙的结合破灭了.

sentences.en: It was even more miraculous that crews had been found for them.
sentences.cn: 更令人惊奇的是,竟能给那么多的小船找到了水手.

sentences.en: Living cells have extremely efficient and near - miraculous devices for transforming energy.
sentences.cn: 活细胞中有非常有效的,近乎奇迹的转化能量的元件.

sentences.en: She made a miraculous recovery from her injuries.
sentences.cn: 她受伤后奇迹般地康复了。

sentences.en: That the miraculous spring would wash away all defilement.
sentences.cn: 奇妙的泉水会洗掉一切的污秽.

sentences.en: The army won a miraculous victory over a much stronger enemy.
sentences.cn: 这支军队打败了强得多的敌人,赢得奇迹般的胜利.

sentences.en: The change in Felicity was miraculous.
sentences.cn: 费莉西蒂的变化不可思议。

sentences.en: The horse made a miraculous recovery to finish a close third.
sentences.cn: 这匹马奇迹般地恢复了状态，以微弱的劣势位居第三。

sentences.en: The more miraculous parts of this account should be taken with a pinch of salt.
sentences.cn: 对这篇记述中那些颇具神奇色彩的部分也不应全信。

sentences.en: The wounded man made a miraculous recovery.
They had a miraculous escape when their car plunged into a river.
sentences.cn: 他们的车冲入河里，而他们却奇迹般地逃生了。

words.tran_cn: 奇迹般地；神奇地；非凡地；出乎意料地
奇迹，奇迹般的人或物；惊人的事例

trans.tran_cn: 奇迹般的，不可思议的，神奇
trans.tran_en: very good, completely unexpected, and often very lucky
